comment: She and Dr porter are very nice and passionate about the course. However the class is WAYYY disorganized. Never gave us feedback or rubrics after a major assignment, said they would drop the lowest quiz grade and never did, and had 12 in class activities but only graded 5. Hopefully they will fix the course but I doubt it.

LOVEEE Nandan!! She is so passionate about what she teaches. She is able to really engage the entire classroom, and I was never bored in her class. Her classes are heavily dependent on class participation, and coming to class prepared: reading all material, watching required videos, etc. I highly recommend taking Dr. Nandan, amazing professor.
